game.controllers

Interface PacManController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHuman, AbstractPlayer, Human, MyPacMan, NearestPillPacMan, NearestPillPacManVS, RandomNonRevPacMan, RandomPacMan, TestPacMan

    public interface PacManController
    Interface that Ms Pac-Man controllers must implement. The only method that is required is getAction(-), which returns the direction to be taken: Up - Right - Down - Left -> 0 - 1 - 2 - 3 Any other number is considered to be a lack of action (Neutral).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAction(Game game, long timeDue)

      • getAction
